issue.message: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE no longer provides write access when targeting Android 10+
Attribute `usesCleartextTraffic` is only used in API level 23 and higher (current min is 21)
Attribute `networkSecurityConfig` is only used in API level 24 and higher (current min is 21)
A newer version of com.google.firebase:firebase-bom than 33.1.1 is available: 33.7.0
A newer version of org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-stdlib than 1.7.0 is available: 1.9.20

The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and higher and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures cloud backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.
This folder configuration (`v21`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 21. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
The resource `R.drawable.splash_logo` appears to be unused
